name: The Spire (itch) (aidan9lives)
description: The Spire is about a test subject who needs to get out of a spire to live a free life by no getting tested on for his superpowers. He will need to get past enemies and save other test subjects, you will need to make it down the the spire, level to level until you get to the bottom level and are free to live a safe and peaceful life. you will be releasing all the other test subjects at the same time to win this game.
